title: Add Stage Status Fields to Project Model
learnings: Use Python enums with str base class for SQLAlchemy enum columns to ensure proper serialization
Use server_default in addition to default for migrations to set values for existing rows
Pydantic schemas need separate enum definitions (not reusing SQLAlchemy enums) for API serialization

title: Add Computed Progress Field
learnings: Pydantic computed_field decorator allows adding computed properties to response schemas that are calculated at serialization time
Use .value on enum fields to get string representation for comparisons in utility functions

title: Create Breadcrumbs Component
learnings: UI components go in ui/src/components/common/ for reusable elements
Project uses JSX (not TSX) - no TypeScript typecheck script available
Use npm run lint and npm run build for quality checks

title: Create Breadcrumbs Component
learnings: Breadcrumbs component was already committed in 46b22a0

title: Create Stage Stepper Component
learnings: Use BEM naming with stage-stepper__ prefix for CSS classes
Status indicators use Unicode characters: ○ (empty), ◐ (in_progress), ● (complete)

title: Create Project Card Component
learnings: Use getStageStatus() helper to normalize different status enums to empty/in_progress/complete
getCurrentStage() returns first incomplete stage or last stage if all complete
Mini stepper uses same Unicode indicators as StageStepper: ○ (empty), ◐ (in_progress), ● (complete)

title: Create Empty State Component
learnings: EmptyState component now supports both single actionButton (legacy) and actions array (new) for multiple buttons
CSS class naming follows BEM convention with double underscore (e.g., empty-state__icon)
Secondary button variant available via .secondary class for multi-button layouts

title: Create Status Badge Component
learnings: Extended existing StatusBadge component rather than creating new file - reuse existing components when adding variants
Project uses JSX not TypeScript despite manifest listing .tsx files

title: Dashboard Route and Layout
learnings: Dashboard pages follow same structure as other pages with main-content wrapper
Action cards use BEM naming with modifier classes for variants (--primary, --secondary)

title: Dashboard Project Grid
learnings: Use Promise.all to fetch stats for multiple projects in parallel
Sort by lastActivity fallback to updated_at fallback to created_at for robust date handling

title: Dashboard Filter Dropdown
learnings: Use useSearchParams hook from react-router-dom v7 for URL query param persistence
Filter by current stage requires getStageStatus and getCurrentStage logic duplicated from ProjectCard

title: Dashboard Search
learnings: Use useRef for debounce timers to avoid stale closure issues
Preserve other URL params when updating one by using new URLSearchParams(searchParams)

title: Dashboard Empty State
learnings: Use EmptyState component for consistent empty state styling across the app
When using links as buttons inside EmptyState, style them with .empty-state-link-btn class
Differentiate empty state messages: no projects vs no search results

title: Create New Project Modal
learnings: Modals use the common Modal component from components/common/Modal.jsx
Action cards can be buttons with the action-card class; added text-align: left and cursor: pointer for button behavior

title: Update Navigation to Dashboard
learnings: Use Navigate component with replace prop for clean redirects
Remove unused imports to avoid lint warnings

title: Auto-Update Stage Status on Content Change
learnings: Create centralized stage_status.py utility for consistent status updates across all content modification endpoints
Use local imports in service methods to avoid circular import issues between services
Status updates should check current state before updating to avoid unintentional downgrades (e.g., reviewed to has_items)

title: Create Stage Status API Endpoints
learnings: Use StageStatusEnum to define valid stage names for path parameters
STAGE_STATUS_MAPPING pattern maps stage names to field names and their status enums
Validate status values against the correct enum and return 400 with valid options on error

title: Create Confirmation Dialog Component
learnings: Use role=alertdialog for confirmation dialogs (more semantically correct than role=dialog)
Type-to-confirm pattern requires careful UX: auto-focus input, show expected text in label, reset on dialog open

title: Project View Route and Header
learnings: Use get() from services/api for fetching project data
Follow existing loading/error state patterns from DashboardPage

title: Project View Breadcrumbs
learnings: getBreadcrumbItems() builds dynamic path based on project and current stage
STAGE_LABELS constant maps stage keys to display names for breadcrumbs
currentStage state prepared for P2-001c integration

title: Project View Stepper Integration
learnings: Map backend stage-specific status enums to StageStepper generic statuses (empty, in_progress, complete)
Use determineCurrentStage to auto-select the first incomplete stage
Stage click handler updates currentStage and navigates to stage-specific URL

title: Project View Content Area
learnings: Use underscore prefix for unused props to avoid lint warnings (e.g., project: _project)
Stage components receive project prop for future use even if placeholder
Use STAGE_COMPONENTS map pattern for rendering dynamic components based on state

title: Implement Stage Routing
learnings: Use useParams to read route params like stage from URL
Derive state from URL for single source of truth (currentStage from urlStage)
Use replace: true in navigate for redirect to avoid cluttering browser history

title: Create Stage Header Component
learnings: Created new stage directory for stage-specific components separate from stages (content) directory

title: Create Stage Actions Component
learnings: Stage components use sticky positioning for fixed footer behavior
BEM naming with stage-actions__ prefix follows existing patterns

title: Create Project Settings Modal
learnings: Use put() from services/api for updating projects
Archive functionality requires backend model change with migration
ConfirmationDialog component supports type-to-confirm with confirmText prop

title: Dashboard Archive Filter
learnings: Archived projects filter logic: when archived filter selected show only archived=true, otherwise exclude archived projects from all stage filters
Visual indicator pattern: use --archived modifier class for muted styling plus badge element for explicit label

title: Requirements Stage - Empty State
learnings: EmptyState component accepts actions array for multiple buttons
Use secondary class for secondary button variant in EmptyState

title: Add Meeting Modal UI
learnings: Modal component pattern uses common Modal wrapper with onClose prop
File upload zone uses hidden input with drag-and-drop overlay pattern
Use FileReader API for reading uploaded text files

title: Add Meeting File Upload
learnings: File upload validation should provide user feedback when invalid files are rejected, not fail silently

title: Add Meeting AI Extraction
learnings: FormData must be used for multipart/form-data API calls, fetch is preferred over the api.js wrapper for such cases

title: Add Meeting Results Display
learnings: EventSource SSE streaming requires proper cleanup in useEffect
Indeterminate checkbox state requires ref manipulation (el.indeterminate = ...)
Group-by operations with indices need careful handling to maintain selection state

title: Requirements Stage - Add Manually
learnings: POST endpoint for manual requirements uses RequirementCreate schema with section and content fields
AddManuallyModal supports Add (stays open) and Add & Close patterns for efficient batch entry
Requirements use history tracking with Action.created for manual additions

title: Requirements Stage - Display List
learnings: RequirementSection exports SECTION_ORDER and SECTION_LABELS for consistent section ordering across components
StageHeader component accepts status and statusLabel props for displaying requirements progress
AddManuallyModal supports defaultSection prop for pre-selecting a section when adding from specific sections

title: Requirements Stage - Inline Edit
learnings: Use useRef and useEffect for auto-focus on edit mode entry
Optimistic updates with rollback pattern for edit operations
Re-throw errors from async save handlers to keep edit mode open on failure

title: Requirements Stage - Mark as Reviewed
learnings: StageActions component uses primaryAction, secondaryAction, tertiaryAction props for buttons
PATCH /api/projects/{id}/stages/{stage} endpoint updates individual stage status
onProjectUpdate prop pattern allows child components to trigger parent refresh

title: PRD Stage - Empty State
learnings: Use disabled attribute with title for tooltip on disabled buttons
Warning banners follow amber color scheme with FEF3C7 background and F59E0B border

title: PRD Stage - Generate PRD Modal
learnings: PRD generation uses mode parameter with values draft or detailed
Modal pattern uses radio buttons styled as selectable cards for better UX
Requirements count can be calculated by summing array lengths across sections from the requirements API response

title: PRD Stage - Section Streaming
learnings: usePRDStreamingV2 hook handles all SSE streaming logic with section-by-section status tracking
react-markdown package is used for rendering PRD content
SectionStatus enum provides PENDING, GENERATING, COMPLETED, FAILED states for visual feedback

title: PRD Stage - Preview and Edit Tabs
learnings: PRD update API expects sections array with title/content, not raw_markdown; the backend regenerates raw_markdown from sections
formatTimeAgo helper function handles relative time formatting for last edited timestamp
Debounced auto-save pattern with blur trigger for immediate save works well for content editing

title: PRD Stage - Mark as Ready
learnings: StageActions component provides consistent UI for stage action buttons
PATCH /api/projects/{id}/stages/prd with status: ready updates prd_status
Pattern: add isReady check against project?.prd_status for conditional button state

title: User Stories Stage - Empty State
learnings: Empty state pattern consistent with PRDStage and RequirementsStage
Warning banner pattern for showing prerequisites (PRD not ready)
Generate button disabled when prerequisite stage not complete

title: User Stories Stage - Generate Stories Modal
learnings: Modal component pattern consistent with GeneratePRDModal using BEM CSS naming
Radio options for exclusive format selection, checkboxes for optional include options
Prefix unused props with underscore to satisfy ESLint no-unused-vars

title: User Stories Stage - Story Card Component
learnings: StoryCard already had most features; extended with drag handle and priority badge
Use showDragHandle prop to conditionally render drag handle for non-reorderable contexts
Priority badge conditionally renders only when story.priority is defined (data model may not have it yet)

title: User Stories Stage - Edit Story
learnings: StoryEditModal already existed with most fields; only priority was missing
Use story-edit-field--third CSS class for 3-column layouts in the edit modal

title: User Stories Stage - Mark as Refined
learnings: Follow PRDStage pattern for mark as status functionality using StageActions component and patch API call
Use onProjectUpdate callback prop to trigger parent to refresh project data after status changes
StoryCard component already supports onEdit and onDelete callbacks for editing/deleting stories

title: User Stories Stage - Delete Story
learnings: Delete functionality was proactively implemented in P3-017 (Story Card Component); StoryCard already has delete button, confirmation modal, and handler wired up; UserStoriesStage already integrates deleteStory API call and reloads list after deletion

title: PRD Version Storage
learnings: PRD versioning was already implemented via PRD model with version field and project_id, unique constraint on (project_id, version), generate endpoint auto-increments version, list endpoint returns all versions with pagination

title: PRD Version History UI
learnings: Version history component should use callback-based preview rather than navigation for in-page previewing
Use previewVersion state to toggle between viewing current and historical versions

title: PRD Version Restore
learnings: Version restore creates new version by copying content from source PRD
Restore button should only appear when previewing a historical version, not the current one
Use callback pattern for restore success to allow parent component to update state and show feedback

title: PRD Stage - Regenerate with Warning
learnings: ConfirmationDialog component is reusable and accepts variant, title, message, confirmLabel, and cancelLabel props
PRD versioning is handled by the generate endpoint - it auto-creates a new version so current PRD is preserved in history

title: User Stories Stage - Drag and Drop Reorder
learnings: HTML5 Drag and Drop API is sufficient for simple reorder without external libraries
Use wrapper div for drag events to avoid interfering with card expand/collapse clicks
Optimistic UI updates with error rollback pattern for responsive feel

title: User Stories Stage - Filters
learnings: Use useMemo for filtering to avoid recalculating on every render
Search filter checks story_id, title, description, and labels for matches

title: User Stories Stage - Add Story Manually
learnings: StoryEditModal can be reused for both create and edit modes by making story prop optional
Backend auto-generates story_number by finding max in project then incrementing
Set isCreateMode = \!story pattern for dual-mode components

title: User Stories Stage - Generate More Stories
learnings: Reuse existing modal by rendering it in both empty state and list view
StageActions secondaryAction for additional actions in list view

title: User Stories Stage - Labels
learnings: LabelInput component supports inline editing with autocomplete from allLabels prop
Use optimistic updates for label add/remove with revert on API error
StoryCard can receive onLabelAdd and onLabelRemove callbacks for inline label management

title: User Stories Stage - Summary with Priority Count
learnings: Use useMemo for derived calculations that depend on stories array to ensure updates are dynamic
Summary only shows non-zero counts for cleaner display

title: PRD Stage - Write Manually
learnings: For manual PRD creation, set PRD status=READY but project prd_status=draft so user can still mark as ready later
PRDCreateRequest schema mirrors PRDUpdateRequest structure
Use onProjectUpdate callback to refresh project state after creating new PRD

title: PRD Stage - Save Status Indicator
learnings: Save status indicator was already implemented in P3-011 as part of the debounced auto-save pattern

title: Quick Convert Landing Page
learnings: Use conversion card pattern similar to action cards on dashboard
Back link pattern uses inline-flex with SVG arrow icon

title: QC Requirements Route and Input UI
learnings: Use same file upload pattern as AddMeetingModal for consistency
Quick Convert pages use max-width constraint and teal color theme to match the card

title: QC Requirements Processing and Results
learnings: Use useCallback for memoizing extraction functions that depend on external state
Section-level checkbox with indeterminate state requires DOM ref assignment for proper display
BEM naming convention with component prefix (qc-requirements__*) maintains consistency with existing pages

title: QC PRD Route and Input UI
learnings: PRD page uses purple color scheme (#9333EA) matching the conversion card color from QuickConvertPage
Input source toggle pattern allows switching between different input types dynamically

title: QC PRD Streaming and Result Display
learnings: Quick Convert pages use simulated generation (no backend API) following the RequirementsPage pattern
Markdown rendering uses react-markdown package already available in the project
Section streaming simulation uses state management with SectionStatus enum for pending/generating/completed states

title: QC Stories Route and Input UI
learnings: Follow QC PRD page pattern for input source toggle and file upload
Use blue (#3B82F6) as accent color for Stories pages
Include options use checkbox pattern while format options use radio pattern

title: QC Stories Generation and Display
learnings: Follow QC PRD page pattern for simulated generation with progress state
Story cards need checkbox selection state managed at page level
Reuse StoryEditModal component for inline editing capability

title: Save to Project Modal
learnings: Created quick-convert components directory for reusable QC components
Modal follows same patterns as NewProjectModal with toggle options

title: QC Requirements Actions
learnings: Use useNavigate with state object to pass data between routes
Download functionality uses Blob API with createObjectURL for client-side file generation
Action buttons should be disabled when no items are selected (getSelectedCount() === 0)

title: QC PRD Actions
learnings: Action buttons pattern: secondary buttons for auxiliary actions (Download, Save), primary button for main flow continuation (Generate Stories)
Download functionality creates blob from markdown content and triggers programmatic download

title: QC Stories Reorder and Actions
learnings: Rename drag handlers to avoid conflicts with existing file upload drop handlers
Action bar pattern: left side for selection controls, right side for primary actions

title: Quick Convert - Download Functionality
learnings: Use utils/ not lib/ directory in React projects to avoid Python gitignore patterns
Centralized download utilities work well with typed JSDoc comments for IDE support

title: Quick Convert - Data Chaining Between Pages
learnings: Data chaining via navigate with state object is preferred over sessionStorage for React Router apps
Visual indicator pattern: show chained-indicator div with link icon when fromPreviousStep is true
Clear fromPreviousStep flag when user manually edits the textarea content

title: QC Mockups Route and Input UI
learnings: Quick Convert pages follow consistent pattern: input section, options section, actions section
Device selection allows multi-select with at least one required
Orange color scheme (F97316) for mockups matches the conversion card on landing page

title: QC Mockups Generation and Display
learnings: Placeholder mockup images can be embedded as SVG data URIs for simulated generation
Generation state pattern matches QuickConvertStoriesPage with isGenerating, generationError, generatedMockups states
Result views should include Start Over functionality to reset state

title: QC Mockups Refine and Actions
learnings: Refine pattern uses textarea with regenerate actions similar to other QC pages
SaveToProjectModal can be extended to handle new data types by adding case handlers
3 Variations button generates variations by iterating original devices with variation counter

title: Quick Convert - Session Storage
learnings: Session storage restoration should be skipped when navigation state contains data from previous step to maintain data chaining flow
Each QC page needs its own storage key to avoid conflicts between different conversion types

title: Quick Convert - Navigation Warning
learnings: useBlocker hook from react-router-dom handles in-app navigation blocking; use state to show confirmation dialog when blocker.state === blocked
beforeunload event for browser close/refresh must set e.returnValue for modern browsers even though custom message is ignored
Track dataSaved state separately from data existence to avoid false positives after save/download actions

title: Export Stage - Default State
learnings: Export cards follow conversion-card pattern from QuickConvertPage
Use StageHeader for consistent stage header with status badge
Export cards are buttons for interactive exports, divs for disabled/coming-soon items

title: Export Stage - Markdown Export
learnings: Use JSZip library for client-side ZIP file generation
Custom checkbox styling requires position:absolute on input and custom ::after for checkmark
Export cards with checkboxes need expanded layout with flex-direction:column

title: Export Stage - JSON Export
learnings: JSON export uses same checkbox pattern as Markdown export but with separate state
Blue color variant for buttons/checkboxes uses CSS modifier classes (--blue suffix)

title: Mockups Stage - Empty State
learnings: EmptyState component accepts actions array for multiple buttons
Use disabled prop with title for tooltip on disabled buttons

title: Mockups Stage - Generate from Stories Modal
learnings: Follow existing modal patterns like GenerateStoriesModal for consistency
Device selection should allow multiple selections but prevent deselecting the last device
Load and select all stories by default in generation modals

title: Mockups Stage - Describe UI Modal
learnings: Modal components follow BEM naming convention with component prefix (e.g., describe-ui-modal__field)
Unused props should be prefixed with underscore to avoid lint warnings (e.g., projectId: _projectId)

title: Mockups Stage - Mockup Grid
learnings: MockupCard follows card pattern with thumbnail + content layout similar to StoryCard
MockupFilters extends filter pattern with device, style, and status dropdowns
Mockups grid uses CSS grid with auto-fill for responsive layout
Mock data used for demonstration until backend API is implemented

title: Mockups Stage - Mockup Card
learnings: MockupCard was already implemented as part of P5-004 - task decomposition had overlap
Component includes thumbnail with placeholder, device icons, status/style badges, and action buttons with delete confirmation modal

title: Mockups Stage - Detail Modal
learnings: MockupDetailModal uses the common Modal component with large max-width for full image display
Refine feature includes collapsible text input section that shows when Refine button is clicked
Variations button triggers async callback with mockup ID for generating alternative mockups

title: Export Stage - Export History
learnings: Export history uses localStorage with project-specific filtering
formatRelativeTime helper handles time display for history entries
History entries include id, projectId, type, filename, items array, and date

title: Mockups Stage - Rename Mockup
learnings: Inline edit pattern: toggle between display and input mode with isEditing state
Use setTimeout on blur to allow button clicks to register before blur handler runs
Edit button opacity 0 by default, appears on parent hover for clean UI

title: Mockups Stage - Download All
learnings: JSZip is available for creating zip downloads; use triggerDownload pattern from download.js utility
StageActions supports tertiaryAction for text-style buttons like Download All
Files without image URLs can include placeholder .txt files with mockup metadata

title: Dashboard Loading Skeleton
learnings: Skeleton cards provide better UX than spinners for grid layouts
Use aria-busy and aria-label for loading state accessibility

title: Project View Loading Skeleton
learnings: Use same shimmer animation pattern as dashboard skeleton for consistency
Skeleton mimics actual component structure (breadcrumbs, header, stepper, content) for smooth transition

title: Stage Content Loading States
learnings: Use shared StageLoader component for consistent loading states across stages
Stage-specific theming can be achieved via CSS classes (e.g., stage-loader--prd) that override spinner colors

title: API Error Toast Notifications
learnings: Use a ToastContext provider to manage global toast state
Toast component supports error/success/warning/info variants
useToast hook provides showError, showSuccess, showWarning, showInfo methods

title: Generation Error Handling
learnings: PRDStage already had proper error handling with retry/cancel; UserStoriesStage needed a dedicated error state view for consistency
Error state shows when streamStatus is error AND isGenerating is false to avoid conflict with inline error during generation

title: 404 and Network Errors
learnings: Use navigator.onLine API and online/offline events for network detection
Add catch-all 404 route as LAST route in Routes component

title: Dashboard Mobile Layout
learnings: Use min-height: 44px for touch-friendly interactive elements
Mobile breakpoints at 768px (tablet) and 640px (phone) cover most devices
Responsive filters should be full-width on mobile with flex-direction: column

title: Remove Legacy PRD Landing Page
learnings: Legacy landing pages were replaced with redirects to /dashboard using Navigate component with replace prop
Orphaned LandingPage.jsx was a dead file that had links to the old routes but was never imported after DashboardPage was created

title: Remove Legacy Stories Landing Page
learnings: StoriesLandingPage followed same pattern as PRDLandingPage with project selector UI
Redirect to /dashboard was already in place from prior work; this task only needed to delete the orphaned component files
E2E tests already had coverage for the redirect behavior at /app/stories
